help.command_homekit: This is experimental feature, works only with Lightbulb, Lock Services for now.
help.command_brightness_move: Instead of setting a brightness by value, you can also move it and stop it after a certain time. Example: -5 payload will start moving the brightness down at 5 units per second.
help.command_brightness_step: Instead of setting a brightness by value, you can also change current value up or down.
help.option_transition: Specifies the number of seconds the transition to this state takes. Doesn't work for brightness=0, state=toggle.
